name: @Good-Ghosting/custom-project-name-generator
description: Generate a random, unique, heroku-like name for your app/project/server etc. e.g. "resonant-silence". Extends the original package from Akash Kurdekar (git://github.com/aceakash/project-name-generator.git) by allowing custom adjectives and nouns.
author: Akash Kurdekar, Francis Odisi
